metadata.title: CVE-2022-28893 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: The SUNRPC subsystem in the Linux kernel through 5.17.2 can call xs_xprt_free before ensuring that sockets are in the intended state.

criterions.comment: linux package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
